attributes.review:
i opened the app and all of a sudden i heard a loud THUD from my living room??? i went over to inspect and I saw my vans running towards me, with the shoelaces gripping a knife?? it was crazy man! i even had to throw a skateboard at it to appease the demonic skater shoe.

DO NOT download this app if you want to live another day!!!

(also kinda glitchy)
attributes.title: app possessed my shoes and tried to kill me

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what donald trumps plans are but then i realized he can’t give me free mcdonald’s for the rest of my life. yknow i even emailed them asking, because i simply didn’t understand why i couldn’t get mcdonald’s for life🏃🏻 how come he can give it to all the nfl players but NOT ME 👿 ugh anyways, settleforbiden2020
attributes.title: 👨🏼‍🦯👨🏼‍🦯

attributes.review: this is one of the worst apps i’ve ever had the displeasure of downloading onto my phone. it is SUPER glitchy and caused my phone to crash almost every time i opened the app. not to mention all the gross content within the app. 0/10, would not recommend ANYONE even considering getting this app.
attributes.title: awful app

attributes.review: DONT GET THIS APP i downloaded this app last week and it was okay at first until i started having nightmares every night about Obama holding a gun to my head telling me to delete the app and give it one star the nightmares wouldn’t stop until i did what he told me to do (this has nothing to do with tiktok i sware)
attributes.title: this app is trash

attributes.review:
This app has done NOTHING but crash my phone. I was curious about a presidential candidate opening an app but I can say now that the app is poorly run and has a terrible UI and it looks horrible. 

It crashes phones and doesn’t contain any helpful information that may have helped me understand his platform. Horrible.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!

attributes.review: I’m surprised this app is still on the app store. I downloaded this to support my pres., but the app crashes 24/7, it crashes when I open it, it crashes when I try to sign up for rallies, overall a bad experience. Please remove this. It does not do our president justice. smh my head
attributes.title: Terrible Quality

attributes.review: So I was thinking this was gonna be a good app but when I opened the app a huge orange Cheeto popped up!!! I was so frightened because I have cheetophobia(real thing) that I dropped my phone down the stairs!!!! My duck then saw the Cheeto on the front and started EATING my phone!!!! The screen cracked and I had to get it repaired for 666 dollars!!! I’m warning you SAVE YOURELF FROM THIS APP BEFORE ITS TOO LATE!!!
attributes.title: Ducks and Cheetos

attributes.review: I got this app intending to never sign up for a COVID Rally or support Donald Trump because he is a self-centered piece of trash. The United States in the last four years have turned into a country that I have so much trouble recognizing. This human is an embarrassment to our country and his app will only continue to spread misinformation and hatred across the US. I challenge Donald Trump to Agni Kai.
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: This app is so horrible. First reason is that he is a rapist and racist. He doesn’t care for minorities and absolutely no one should vote for this orange. Secondly, he is taking human medical rights and treating others as if they weren’t human. Thirdly, he is a danger to society and hasn’t done anything to improve the community for minorities. Fourthly, he has a tiny ding dong and deserves to be dumped in the ocean :)) vote Bernie!!
attributes.title: So bad.

attributes.review: You are trying to take down tiktok so we are going to take you down too. There is no reason to take away our app because you can’t handle the power it gives us. Let people speak, let people be heard. Pretty sure it’s agains the constitution at this point. Gen Z will forever fight!
attributes.title: Gen Z fight back
